Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class Gui

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.Gui
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class Gui
extends ViewObservable
implements View
This class implements all methods of View. Is used for the Graphic User Interface.

    • showMatchInfo

      public void showMatchInfo​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> players, java.util.List<ReducedGod> gods, java.util.List<Color> colors, java.lang.String activePlayer)
      Description copied from interface: View
      Shows the match info. Infos are about the active player, the other players and their gods.
      Specified by:
      showMatchInfo in interface View
      Parameters:
      players - the list of currently playing players.
      gods - the list of gods chosen by each player.
      colors - a list of player's color.
      activePlayer - the currently active player (player's turn).
